if (MYSQL_FOUND)
   add_library(ncbi_xdbapi_mysql
       connection context lang_cmd result
   )
   include_directories(SYSTEM ${MYSQL_INCLUDE} ${Z_INCLUDE})

   target_link_libraries(ncbi_xdbapi_mysql
       dbapi_driver ${MYSQL_LIBS} ${Z_LIBS}
   )
endif (MYSQL_FOUND)
